content: day 21 / 24 butterfly fly away abbreviations chain - chain flo - front loop only difficulty mc - magic_ring blo - back loop only time 1 h slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet material yarnart macrame hook 3 5 mm written pattern body yellow part row 0 chain 11 turn round 1 single_crochet 10 single_crochet 2 more in the last chain to make a turn single_crochet blo 9 single_crochet 1 more in the last chain to make a turn and finish the oval slip_stitch blo 22 total note round 1 is followed by a 3d structure do not change or cut the yarn yet center 3d modified puff 4 loops on hook flo in each of the single_crochet from round 1 total 22 puffs slip_stitch to the first one additionally the hole can be sewn cut the yarn and weave the ends in modified puff instruction 1 insert hook into the first 2 yo again 3 loops stitch yo and pull on the hook up a loop 2 loops on hook 3 insert hook into the same 4 yo and pull stitch yo and through all loops pull up a loop 4 on hook 1 loop on loops on hook hook continue with the next stitches day 21 / 24 butterfly fly away abbreviations chain - chain flo - front loop only mc - magic_ring blo - back loop only difficulty slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet time 1 h material yarnart macrame double_crochet - double_crochet tc - treble_crochet hook 3 5 mm half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet wings attach the new yarn blo blue in my picture in the 9th single_crochet last before the turn from the round 1 wrong side facing up to make the left wing row 1 wrongside single_crochet 7 chain 2 turn total 7 row 2 rightside double_crochet in the same stitch tc 3 all in the next stitch double_crochet half_double_crochet in the next stitch sl st in the next stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet in the next stitch tc 3 all in the next stitch double_crochet in the next stitch chain 2 and slip_stitch it to the first single_crochet from row 1 chain turn total 13 row 3 ws single_crochet 2 over chain space single_crochet 2 in next 5 stitches slip_stitch to the slip_stitch from previous round single_crochet half_double_crochet in the next stitch double_crochet 2 in the next 5 stitches and slip_stitch to the last single_crochet of row 1 total 25 cut the yarn and weave the ends in right wing is slightly different than the left one - attach the new yarn blue in my picture in the single_crochet blo on the opposite side single_crochet to the first wing - wrong side facing up row 1 wrongside single_crochet 7 chain 2 turn total 7 row 2 rightside double_crochet in the same stitch tc 3 all in the next stitch double_crochet half_double_crochet in the next stitch sl st in the next stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet in the next stitch tc 3 all in the next stitch double_crochet in
